duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide thought leadership and hands-on guidance to business and technology teams to drive a smooth transition into a Lean Agile mindset.
Engage with teams through observation/interaction, workshops, and training to increase understanding and productivity improvements to foster a cohesive Agile approach within the organization.
Support or lead service delivery including facilitation and continuous improvement.
Identify, introduce, and coach teams on opportunities for improvement and growth through coaching and questioning.

Deliver training to support delivery teams, scrum masters, product owners, managers, and leaders to better understand their roles and how they can best support the organization’s transformation to lean-agile ways of working.
Assess the health and agility of teams to help them identify areas for improvement and support them on their agile journey.
Train team members on Agile process and methodologies. Provide objective guidance free of personal or political bias.
Understand the goals of the project, create Agile development strategy, and assist in developing project planning and strategy.
Improve delivery team effectiveness through analysis, teaching, facilitation, and impediment removal.
Assess agile maturity of teams and coach to higher levels of maturity at a sustainable pace.
Communicate with stakeholders to address Agile knowledge gaps and support agile effectiveness.
Assist product owner in writing user stories and teams in estimating user stories. Assist Scrum Master with preplanning, planning, daily scrum, and retrospectives.
Develop strategies and tactics that drive enterprise agility through various learning modes and storytelling.
Collaborate with peers to support high-priority initiatives and build effective relationships with key stakeholders and cross-functional teams.
Manage key vendor relationships and align content to context, responsible for supplier performance and investment decisions and outcomes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in a related field. Professional Agile Certification and industry experience in Agile roles. Must have strong knowledge of Agile Lifecycle Management tools and collaboration tools.
